Description:
We are looking for a skilled Cost Controller to join our team in Dammam, Saudi Arabia. As a Cost Controller, you will be responsible for monitoring and controlling project costs to ensure that they stay within budget. You will work closely with project managers and other stakeholders to analyze costs, identify potential cost-saving opportunities, and implement strategies to manage expenses effectively.Responsibilities:Monitor and control project costs throughout the project lifecycle
Analyse project budgets, expenses, and variances
Prepare cost reports and forecasts for management
Identify cost-saving opportunities and recommend strategies to reduce expenses
Collaborate with project managers and other stakeholders to ensure cost control measures are implemented
Review and validate invoices, contracts, and purchase orders
Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with cost control procedures
Provide cost analysis and support for project proposals and business cases
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in cost controlSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in finance, accounting, or a related field
Proven experience as a Cost Controller or similar role
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent knowledge of cost control principles and techniques
Proficient in using cost control software and tools
Attention to detail and accuracy
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks simultaneously
Knowledge of the construction industry and project management is a plus

Financial analysis
